About Me

I am a Computer Science student with a strong passion for data science and data analytics. I believe in the power of data to drive meaningful change and create impactful solutions. My goal is to harness data to solve real-world problems, uncover insights, and make informed decisions that can transform lives and improve communities.


With a foundation in programming, statistical analysis, and machine learning, I am committed to using data responsibly and innovatively to build a better future.
